metadata.titleEn: Long-term glacier melt fluctuations of Qiangyong Glacier on the Tibetan Plateau over the past 2500 yr
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原枪勇冰川近2500年融化强度变化数据
metadata.description:
The source of the data is paper: Zhang, J.F., Xu, B.Q., Turner, F., Zhou, L.P., Gao, P., Lü, X.M., & Nesje, A. (2017). Long-term glacier melt fluctuations over the past 2500 yr in monsoonal high asia revealed by radiocarbon-dated lacustrine pollen concentrates. Geology, 45(4), 359-362.
In this paper, the researcher of Institute of Tibetan Plateau Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences and CAS Center for Excellence in Tibetan Plateau Earth Sciences, Baiqing Xu, with his postdoctoral fellow, Jifeng Zhang, and collaborators from Peking University and other institutions, propose that the OPE (“old pollen effect”, the offset between the calibrated 14C ages of pollen in lake sediments and the sediment depositional age) as a new indicator of glacier melt intensity and fluctuations by measuring the radiocarbon ages of the sediments of the proglacial lake of Qiangyong Glacier on the southern Tibetan Plateau with multi-methods (bulk organic matter, pollen concentrates and plant residues). This research suggests that hemispheric-scale temperature variations and mid-latitude Westerlies may be the main controllers of the late Holocene glacier variability in monsoonal High Asia. It also shows that the 20th-century glacier melt intensity exceeded that of two historical warm epochs (the Medieval Warm Period, and the Iron/Roman Age Optimum) and is unprecedented at least for the past 2.5 k.y.
This data is provided by the author of the paper, it contains long-term glacier melt fluctuations of Qiangyong Glacier over the past 2500 yr reconstructed by the OPE.
A 3.06-m-long core (QYL09-4) and a 1.06-m-long parallel gravity core (QY-3) were retrieved by the researchers from the depositional center of Qiangyong Co. Using a new composite extraction procedure, they obtained relatively pure pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates (PRC; >125 μm) from the finely laminated sediments. Bulk organic matter and the PRC and pollen fractions were used for 14C dating independently. All 14C ages were calibrated with IntCal13 (Reimer et al., 2013). The age-depth model is based on 210Pb and 137Cs ages and five 14C ages of PRC. Only the youngest PRC ages were used for the age-depth model, whereas older ages that produce a stratigraphic reversal and are apparently influenced by redeposited or aquatic plant material were rejected. The deposition model was constructed using the P_Sequence algorithm in Oxcal 4.2 (Bronk Ramsey, 2008). For the calculation of the offset between the calibrated pollen 14C ages and the sediment depositional age, 2σ intervals for interpolated ages according to the deposition model were subtracted from calibrated pollen ages (2σ span), resulting in the age offset between pollen and estimated sediment ages (ΔAgepollen).
This data is radiocarbon ages and the calculated ΔAgepollen of core QYL09-4 from a proglacial lake of Qiangyong Glacier.
The data contains fields as follows:				
Lab No.
Dating Material
Depth (cm)
14C age (yr BP)
∆Agepollen (≥95.4 % yrs)
Sediment Age (CE)
See attachments for data details: ZhangJF et al. 2017 GEOLOGY_Long-term glacier melt fluctuations over the past 2500 yr on the Tibetan Plateau.pdf.
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集来源于论文：Zhang, J. F., Xu, B., Turner, F., Zhou, L., Gao, P., Lü, X., & Nesje, A. (2017). Long-term glacier melt fluctuations over the past 2500 yr in monsoonal High Asia revealed by radiocarbon-dated lacustrine pollen concentrates. Geology, 45(4), 359-362.
在本文中，中国科学院青藏高原研究所、地球科学卓越创新中心徐柏青研究员及其博士后张继峰与来自北京大学等单位的合作者，对高原南部枪勇冰川冰前湖沉积物进行了多方法（植物残体、孢粉浓缩物、全有机质）放射性碳测年，提出了一个重建古冰川融化强度的新指标（“老孢粉效应”，即沉积物孢粉年龄与沉积物真实年龄的差值）。该研究发现北半球温度及西风环流活动可能是高原季风区冰川百年尺度波动的主控因素，高原近代的冰川融化强度达到过去2500年以来最强，超过了历史上的中世纪暖期和罗马暖期。
数据由论文作者提供，数据包含了基于老孢粉效应（ΔAgepollen）重建的过去2500年枪勇冰川融化强度变化数据。
研究人员从枪勇错冰前湖获得了一根3.06米长的湖芯（QYL09-4）和一根1.06m长的平行重力钻湖芯（QY-3），使用新的复合提取及纯化程序，从沉积物中获得了相对纯的孢粉浓缩物和植物残体浓缩物（PRC；> 125μm）。对全有机质，PRC和孢粉浓缩物分别进行了14C年代测定。所有14C年龄都使用IntCal13（Reimer et al., 2013）进行了校准。年龄深度模型基于210Pb、137Cs年龄及五个PRC的14C年龄。使用Oxcal 4.2（Bronk Ramsey，2008）中的P_Sequence算法构建岩芯的年龄深度模型。将校准的孢粉年龄中减去根据沉积模型得出的真实沉积物年龄，从而得出老孢粉效应值（ΔAgepollen）。
数据为湖芯（QYL09-4）的放射性碳测年与老孢粉效应数据。
数据包含字段如下：
Lab No.：样本编号
Dating Material：测年材料
Depth (cm)：深度（厘米）
14C age (yr BP)：碳14年龄（年 距今）
ΔAgepollen (≥95.4 % yrs)：孢粉年龄与估算的沉积物年龄间的差值（≥95.4 % 年）
Sediment Age (CE)：沉积物年龄（公元）
数据详细信息参见附件：ZhangJF et al. 2017 GEOLOGY_Long-term glacier melt fluctuations over the past 2500 yr on the Tibetan Plateau.pdf。
metadata.instructions: The filename is: Radiocarbon ages and the calculated ΔAgepollen of core QYL09-4 from a proglacial lake of Qiangyong Glacier.xls, it can be viewed and edited by Excel software of Microsoft Office.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据名称为：Radiocarbon ages and the calculated ΔAgepollen of core QYL09-4 from a proglacial lake of Qiangyong Glacier.xls，可用Microsoft Office中的Excel软件进行查看和编辑。

background: Long-term records of glacier mass changes are important for improving our understanding of glacier dynamics and for predicting the response of glaciers to future climate change. The Tibetan Plateau (TP) and its surroundings contain the largest number of glaciers outside the polar regions and have shown spatially heterogeneous glacier responses to global warming. Moraine sequences directly record ice margin change, but they are discrete low-resolution series and can be easily eroded by subsequent glacial advances of a larger extent. Multi-proxies (e.g., organic matter content, elements, and grain size) from proglacial lake sediments have been used to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change, but nonglacial processes (e.g., rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows) can confound the extraction of glacial signals. Pollen preserved in Tibetan ice cores has been used to reconstruct past climate change, but no studies have focused on the effects of the melt of old ice in terms of the release of old pollen. According to a conceptual model of glacier flow, young ice containing modern pollen is formed in the accumulation area and then flows slowly to the ablation area and becomes a reservoir of old pollen. Intensified glacier melt releases more old pollen from the old ice, which, together with overridden soil from beneath the glacier, enters proglacial lakes and results in a larger offset between the calibrated 14C ages of pollen in lake sediments and the sediment depositional age.
research objective: We define the offset between the calibrated pollen 14C ages and the sediment depositional age as the “old pollen effect” (OPE). We interpret the OPE as a new indicator of glacier melt intensity and its fluctuations. We propose that the OPE can be a new indicator of glacier melt intensity and fluctuations. Sediments from lake Qiangyong Co, China, were used to test our hypothesis through comparisons of the OPE against regional moraine ages. A 2.5 k.y. record of glacier variability is presented and is compared with other paleoclimatic and paleoglacial records in order to infer spatial correlations and dynamics of late Holocene glacier change in monsoonal High Asia.
challenges: However, the above instrumental studies are limited to recent decades, and well-constrained late Holocene glacier chronologies are still sparse. Several studies have integrated sporadic moraine ages on the TP; however, some of the ages are questionable, and temporal and spatial patterns of glacier fluctuations remain unclear. Moraine sequences directly record ice margin change, but they are discrete low-resolution series and can be easily eroded by subsequent glacial advances of a larger extent. Multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments have been used to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change, but nonglacial processes can confound the extraction of glacial signals.
methods: A 3.06-m-long core (QYL09-4) and a 1.06-m-long parallel gravity core (QY-3) were retrieved from the depositional center of Qiangyong Co (see the Data Repository for details). Using a new composite extraction procedure (Fig. DR3), we obtained relatively pure pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates (PRC; >125 mm; Fig. DR4) from the finely laminated sediments. Bulk organic matter and the PRC and pollen fractions were used for 14C dating independently (Table DR1 in the Data Repository). All 14C ages were calibrated with IntCal13 (Reimer et al., 2013). The age-depth model is based on 210Pb and 137Cs ages (Fig. DR5) and five 14C ages of PRC (Fig. 2A). Only the youngest PRC ages were used for the age-depth model, whereas older ages that produce a stratigraphic reversal and are apparently influenced by redeposited or aquatic plant material were rejected. The deposition model was constructed using the P_Sequence algorithm in Oxcal 4.2 (Bronk Ramsey, 2008). For the calculation of the OPE, 2s intervals for interpolated ages according to the deposition model were subtracted from calibrated pollen ages (2s span) (Fig. 2B), resulting in the age offset between pollen and estimated sediment ages (∆Agepollen).
dataset: Sediments from lake Qiangyong Co, China, were used to test our hypothesis through comparisons of the OPE against regional moraine ages.
findings: Using the sediments of a small proglacial lake on the southern Tibetan Plateau, we found that over the past 2.5 k.y., a weakened OPE occurred during three historical cool periods that coincided with regional glacier advances defined by moraine ages. Our reconstructed glacier variability agrees well with glacier fluctuations in the European Alps and the global average temperature record, suggesting that hemispheric-scale temperature variations and/or mid-latitude Westerlies may have controlled the late Holocene glacier variability in monsoonal High Asia. We also show that the 20th century glacier melt intensity has exceeded that of two historical warm periods and is unprecedented over the past 2.5 k.y. This implies that current anthropogenic warming poses a serious threat to the survival of glaciers in monsoonal High Asia.
backgroundCn: 长期的冰川质量变化记录对于提高我们对冰川动力学的理解以及预测冰川对未来气候变化的响应至关重要。青藏高原及其周边地区是极地以外冰川数量最多的地区，已显示出对全球变暖的空间异质性响应。冰碛序列直接记录了冰缘变化，但它们是离散的低分辨率系列，且容易被后续更大范围的冰川推进侵蚀。来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理（例如有机物含量、元素和粒度）已被用于重建冰川变化的连续记录，但非冰川过程（例如降雨事件、崩塌活动和泥石流）可能会干扰冰川信号的提取。保存在青藏高原冰芯中的花粉已被用于重建过去的气候变化，但尚无研究关注古老冰融化对古老花粉释放的影响。根据冰川流动的概念模型，含有现代花粉的年轻冰在积累区形成，然后缓慢流向消融区，成为古老花粉的储存库。加剧的冰川融化释放更多古老花粉，这些花粉与冰川下方覆盖的土壤一起进入冰川前湖，导致湖沉积物中花粉的放射性碳（14C）校准年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间出现更大的偏差。
research objectiveCn: 我们将校准的花粉14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差定义为“老花粉效应”（OPE）。我们将OPE解释为冰川融化强度及其波动的新指标。我们提出OPE可以作为冰川融化强度和波动的新指标。通过将OPE与区域冰碛年龄进行比较，使用中国Qiangyong Co湖的沉积物来检验我们的假设。我们呈现了一个2.5千年的冰川变化记录，并将其与其他古气候和古冰川记录进行比较，以推断季风高亚洲晚全新世冰川变化的空间相关性和动态。
challengesCn: 然而，上述的仪器研究仅限于最近几十年，晚全新世冰川年代学的约束仍然稀缺。一些研究整合了青藏高原上零散的冰碛年龄；然而，其中一些年龄存在疑问，冰川波动的时间和空间模式仍不清楚。冰碛序列直接记录冰缘变化，但它们是离散的低分辨率系列，容易被后续更大范围的冰川推进侵蚀。来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理已被用于重建冰川变化的连续记录，但非冰川过程可能会干扰冰川信号的提取。
methodsCn: 从Qiangyong Co的沉积中心采集了一个3.06米长的岩心（QYL09-4）和一个1.06米长的平行重力岩心（QY-3）（详细信息见数据存储库）。使用一种新的复合提取程序（图DR3），我们从细层沉积物中获得了相对纯净的花粉浓缩物和植物残留物浓缩物（PRC；>125毫米；图DR4）。原始有机物和PRC及花粉分馏物分别用于14C测年（数据存储库中的表DR1）。所有14C年龄均使用IntCal13进行校准（Reimer等，2013）。年龄-深度模型基于210Pb和137Cs年龄（图DR5）以及五个PRC的14C年龄（图2A）。仅使用最年轻的PRC年龄用于年龄-深度模型，而被拒绝的较老年龄则产生了地层反转，并明显受到再沉积或水生植物材料的影响。沉积模型是使用Oxcal 4.2中的P_Sequence算法构建的（Bronk Ramsey，2008）。为了计算OPE，根据沉积模型的插值年龄的2σ区间从校准的花粉年龄（2σ跨度）中减去（图2B），得出了花粉年龄与估计沉积年龄之间的年龄偏差（∆Agepollen）。
datasetCn: 来自中国Qiangyong Co湖的沉积物被用来通过与区域冰碛年龄的比较来检验我们的假设。
findingsCn: 通过对南藏高原一个小型冰川前湖泊沉积物的研究，我们发现，在过去2500年中，三个历史冷期期间发生了减弱的冰川前缘扩展（OPE），这些冷期与通过冰碛年龄定义的区域冰川推进相吻合。我们重建的冰川变动与欧洲阿尔卑斯山的冰川波动以及全球平均温度记录高度一致，这表明半球尺度的温度变化和/或中纬度西风带可能控制了季风高亚洲晚全新世的冰川变动。我们还显示，20世纪的冰川融化强度超过了两个历史暖期，并且在过去2500年中是前所未有的。这意味着当前的人为变暖对季风高亚洲冰川的生存构成了严重威胁。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the data collection method involve the use of pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates for radiocarbon dating?
Verification.QuestionCn: 数据收集方法是否涉及使用花粉浓缩物和植物残留物浓缩物进行放射性碳定年？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the old pollen effect (OPE) considered a new indicator for assessing glacier melt intensity?
Verification.QuestionCn: 旧花粉效应（OPE）是否被视为评估冰川融化强度的新指标？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are the calibrated 14C ages of pollen used to calculate the offset between pollen ages and sediment depositional ages?
Verification.QuestionCn: 经过校准的14C年龄的花粉是否用于计算花粉年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: What is the primary method for dating lake sediments in glacier-related studies: radiocarbon dating, optically stimulated luminescence, or dendrochronology?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在冰川相关研究中，湖泊沉积物的主要测年方法是放射性碳测年、光释光测年还是树轮年代学？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which type of material is more commonly used for radiocarbon dating in glacier sediment studies: bulk organic matter, pollen concentrates, or plant residue concentrates?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在冰川沉积物研究中，哪种材料更常用于放射性碳定年：散装有机物、花粉浓缩物还是植物残留物浓缩物？
Disjunctive.AnswerEn: pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 花粉浓缩物和植物残渣浓缩物

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is the 'old pollen effect' and how is it used as an indicator in glacier melt studies?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 什么是“旧花粉效应”，它如何用作冰川融化研究的指标？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where do researchers obtain sediment cores for reconstructing glacier melt intensity, and what methods are used for dating these sediments?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 研究人员从哪里获取沉积物岩心以重建冰川融化强度，以及用于对这些沉积物进行年代测定的方法是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with using proglacial lake sediments to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change, and how do researchers address these challenges?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 使用前冰湖沉积物重建冰川变化的连续记录面临哪些挑战，研究人员如何应对这些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method suitable for reconstructing long-term glacier melt intensity over centuries?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个适合重建数百年来冰川融化强度的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method suitable for reconstructing long-term glacier melt intensity is the use of radiocarbon dating of pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates from proglacial lake sediments. This method involves retrieving sediment cores from lakes, extracting pollen and plant residues, and conducting radiocarbon dating to develop an age-depth model and calculate the 'old pollen effect' to infer glacier melt intensity over time.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种适合重建长期冰川融化强度的数据收集方法是利用来自冰川前湖沉积物的花粉浓缩物和植物残留物浓缩物的放射性碳定年。这种方法涉及从湖泊中提取沉积物核心，提取花粉和植物残留物，并进行放射性碳定年，以建立年龄-深度模型并计算“旧花粉效应”，从而推断冰川融化强度随时间的变化。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a challenge faced when using multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments to infer glacier changes?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理来推断冰川变化时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge when using multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments is the potential for nonglacial processes, such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows, to confound the extraction of glacial signals. These processes can introduce noise into the data, making it difficult to isolate the specific contributions of glacier melt to the sediment record.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理的一个挑战是，非冰川过程，如降雨事件、崩塌活动和碎屑流，可能会干扰冰川信号的提取。这些过程可能会在数据中引入噪声，使得难以孤立出冰川融水对沉积记录的具体贡献。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the properties of data collection methods used for reconstructing long-term glacier melt fluctuations?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于重建长期冰川融化波动的数据收集方法的属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: extracting and purifying pollen concentrates, plant residue concentrates from lake sediments, radiocarbon dating, calibrated using IntCal13, age-depth model, 210Pb and 137Cs ages, P_Sequence algorithm in Oxcal 4.2, deposition model
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 从湖泊沉积物中提取和纯化花粉浓缩物、植物残留物浓缩物，使用IntCal13校准的放射性碳年代测定，年龄-深度模型，210Pb和137Cs年代，Oxcal 4.2中的P_Sequence算法，沉积模型。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What features define the challenges faced in extracting glacial signals from proglacial lake sediments?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 提取冰川信号时，前冰川湖沉积物面临的挑战有哪些特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: nonglacial processes, stratigraphic reversals, redeposited material, aquatic plant material
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 非冰川过程、地层倒转、再沉积物质、水生植物材料

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the attributes of a dataset exploring past glacier variability through lake sediment analysis?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 通过湖泊沉积物分析探索过去冰川变异性的 dataset 的属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: sample lab numbers, dating materials, depths in centimeters, radiocarbon ages in years BP, offset between pollen and estimated sediment ages (ΔAgepollen), sediment ages in CE
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 样本实验室编号、测年材料、深度（厘米）、放射性碳年代（年 BP）、花粉与估计沉积物年代之间的偏差（ΔAgepollen）、沉积物年代（公元年）。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many cores were retrieved for the analysis of glacier melt intensity on the Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于分析青藏高原冰川融化强度的核心样本数量是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different dating materials were used to determine the 14C ages in the glacier study?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在冰川研究中，用于确定14C年龄的不同测年材料有多少种？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the length of the record for glacier variability reconstructed using sediments from lake Qiangyong Co?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 通过来自Qiangyong Co湖泊的沉积物重建的冰川变异记录的长度是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'old pollen effect' (OPE) in the context of glacier melt intensity research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在冰川融化强度研究的背景下，什么是“旧花粉效应”（OPE）？
Definition.AnswerEn: The 'old pollen effect' (OPE) is defined as the offset between the calibrated pollen 14C ages and the sediment depositional age. It is interpreted as a new indicator of glacier melt intensity and its fluctuations, suggesting that intensified glacier melt releases more old pollen from the old ice, which, together with overridden soil from beneath the glacier, enters proglacial lakes and results in a larger offset between the calibrated 14C ages of pollen in lake sediments and the sediment depositional age.
Definition.AnswerCn: “旧花粉效应”（OPE）被定义为校准的花粉14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差。它被解释为冰川融化强度及其波动的新指标，表明加强的冰川融化释放更多来自旧冰的旧花粉，这些旧花粉与冰川下方的覆盖土壤一起进入冰川前湖泊，从而导致湖泊沉积物中花粉的校准14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差增大。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using 'age-depth models' in glacier melt research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在冰川融化研究中使用“年龄-深度模型”的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Age-depth models are significant in glacier melt research as they help establish the chronological framework for sediment cores, allowing researchers to date the layers accurately. In the study, an age-depth model was constructed using 210Pb and 137Cs ages and five 14C ages of plant residue concentrates (PRC). These models enable the calculation of the old pollen effect by subtracting interpolated ages from calibrated pollen ages, providing insights into glacier melt intensity over time.
Definition.AnswerCn: 年龄-深度模型在冰川融化研究中具有重要意义，因为它们帮助建立沉积物核心的时间框架，从而使研究人员能够准确地对层进行定年。在这项研究中，使用210Pb和137Cs年龄以及五个植物残留浓缩物（PRC）的14C年龄构建了一个年龄-深度模型。这些模型使得通过从校准的花粉年龄中减去插值年龄来计算老花粉效应成为可能，从而提供了关于冰川融化强度随时间变化的见解。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection techniques for reconstructing glacier melt intensity using radiocarbon-dated pollen concentrates compare with other methods such as moraine sequence analysis?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 重建冰川融化强度的数据收集技术，使用放射性碳定年花粉浓缩物与其他方法（如冰碛序列分析）相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection using radiocarbon-dated pollen concentrates offers a continuous record of glacier changes, unlike moraine sequence analysis, which provides discrete and potentially erodible low-resolution records. Moraine sequences directly record ice margin changes, but they can be affected by subsequent glacial advances. In contrast, the pollen concentrate method provides a new indicator, the 'old pollen effect,' to assess glacier melt intensity, offering a more continuous and detailed insight into glacier dynamics.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用放射性碳定年花粉浓缩物进行的数据收集提供了冰川变化的连续记录，这与冰碛序列分析不同，后者提供的是离散且可能遭受侵蚀的低分辨率记录。冰碛序列直接记录冰缘变化，但可能受到后续冰川推进的影响。相比之下，花粉浓缩物方法提供了一种新的指标，即“旧花粉效应”，用于评估冰川融化强度，提供了对冰川动态更连续和详细的洞察。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences between using proglacial lake sediment multi-proxies and pollen concentrates for reconstructing glacier variability?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用前冰川湖沉积物多重指标和花粉浓缩物重建冰川变动之间的相似性和差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both methods aim to reconstruct continuous records of glacier changes; however, proglacial lake sediment multi-proxies may be confounded by nonglacial processes like rainfall and debris flows. Pollen concentrates, on the other hand, specifically utilize the 'old pollen effect' as a novel indicator of glacier melt intensity, focusing on the offset between pollen and sediment deposition ages to reveal fluctuations. This method addresses some of the confounding factors associated with multi-proxies by isolating the glacier melt signal more effectively.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 这两种方法都旨在重建冰川变化的连续记录；然而，前冰川湖沉积物的多重指标可能会受到非冰川过程的干扰，如降雨和泥石流。另一方面，花粉浓缩物则专门利用“旧花粉效应”作为冰川融化强度的新指标，关注花粉和沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差，以揭示波动。这种方法通过更有效地隔离冰川融化信号，解决了与多重指标相关的一些混淆因素。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methodologies were employed in the data collection to ensure the accurate reconstruction of glacier variability over the past 2500 years?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 为了确保准确重建过去2500年冰川变动，采用了哪些数据收集方法？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The methodologies employed included retrieving sediment cores from the depositional center of a proglacial lake, using a new composite extraction procedure to obtain pure pollen and plant residue concentrates, and independently dating bulk organic matter, PRC, and pollen fractions using 14C dating. An age-depth model was constructed based on 210Pb and 137Cs ages and calibrated 14C ages, using the P_Sequence algorithm in Oxcal 4.2. This approach allowed for the accurate reconstruction of glacier variability by comparing the 'old pollen effect' against regional moraine ages.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 所采用的方法包括从冰川前湖的沉积中心提取沉积物核心，使用一种新的复合提取程序获得纯净的花粉和植物残留物浓缩物，并通过14C测年独立测定散装有机物、植物残留物浓缩物和花粉组分的年龄。基于210Pb和137Cs年龄以及校准的14C年龄，使用Oxcal 4.2中的P_Sequence算法构建了年龄-深度模型。这种方法通过将“旧花粉效应”与区域冰碛的年龄进行比较，准确重建了冰川变动。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in using multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change, and how can they be addressed?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理来重建冰川变化的连续记录可能会面临哪些挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in using multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments include the potential for non-glacial processes, such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows, to confound the extraction of glacial signals. These challenges can be addressed by isolating and analyzing specific proxies that are less likely to be influenced by non-glacial processes, such as pollen concentrates, and by using robust statistical models to differentiate between glacial and non-glacial signals in the sediment records.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理指标面临的挑战包括非冰川过程（如降雨事件、崩塌活动和碎屑流）可能会干扰冰川信号的提取。可以通过隔离和分析不太可能受到非冰川过程影响的特定代理指标（如花粉浓缩物）来应对这些挑战，并通过使用稳健的统计模型来区分沉积记录中的冰川信号和非冰川信号。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What underlying factors contribute to the challenges in reconstructing continuous glacier change records from proglacial lake sediments, and how do these factors impact the overall accuracy of data collection?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些潜在因素导致从冰川前湖泊沉积物中重建连续冰川变化记录的挑战，这些因素如何影响数据收集的整体准确性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in reconstructing continuous glacier change records from proglacial lake sediments arise from nonglacial processes such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows, which can confound the extraction of clear glacial signals. These factors affect the accuracy of the data collection by introducing noise and potential misinterpretations in the data intended to reflect glacier changes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 从前冰川湖沉积物中重建连续的冰川变化记录面临的挑战源于非冰川过程，例如降雨事件、崩塌活动和泥石流，这些因素可能会干扰清晰冰川信号的提取。这些因素通过引入噪声和潜在的误解，影响数据收集的准确性，从而影响反映冰川变化的数据。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the 'old pollen effect' considered a reliable indicator of glacier melt intensity, and what are the causal mechanisms that link it to historical glacier fluctuations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: “古花粉效应”被认为是冰川融化强度的可靠指标，其原因是什么？与历史冰川波动之间的因果机制是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The 'old pollen effect' is considered a reliable indicator of glacier melt intensity because intensified glacier melt releases more old pollen from the old ice. This pollen, along with overridden soil from beneath the glacier, enters proglacial lakes, creating a larger offset between the calibrated 14C ages of pollen in lake sediments and the sediment depositional age. This offset helps researchers infer historical glacier fluctuations.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: “旧花粉效应”被认为是冰川融化强度的可靠指标，因为加剧的冰川融化会释放更多来自古老冰层的旧花粉。这些花粉以及来自冰川下方的覆盖土壤进入冰川前湖泊，造成湖泊沉积物中花粉的校准14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的更大偏差。这个偏差帮助研究人员推断历史冰川波动。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary reasons for the limited availability of well-constrained late Holocene glacier chronologies, and how do these limitations affect the development of comprehensive datasets in this domain?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 晚全新世冰川年表可用性有限的主要原因是什么，这些限制如何影响该领域综合数据集的发展？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The limited availability of well-constrained late Holocene glacier chronologies is primarily due to the challenges in integrating sporadic moraine ages, some of which are questionable, and the unclear temporal and spatial patterns of glacier fluctuations. These limitations hinder the development of comprehensive datasets as they result in low-resolution series that are prone to erosion and may not accurately reflect past glacier dynamics.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 晚全新世冰川年表的有限可用性主要是由于整合零散的冰碛年龄所面临的挑战，其中一些年龄存在疑问，以及冰川波动的时间和空间模式不明确。这些限制妨碍了综合数据集的发展，因为它们导致低分辨率的系列，容易受到侵蚀，并可能无法准确反映过去的冰川动态。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the application of multi-proxy data collection methods from proglacial lake sediments impact the accuracy of glacier change reconstruction?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 多代理数据收集方法在前冰川湖沉积物中的应用可能会如何影响冰川变化重建的准确性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The application of multi-proxy data collection methods from proglacial lake sediments can improve the accuracy of glacier change reconstruction by providing continuous records. However, these methods may also introduce challenges due to nonglacial processes, such as rainfall events and debris flows, which can confound the extraction of clear glacial signals. Thus, careful interpretation is required to distinguish between glacial and non-glacial influences on the sediment records.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 来自冰川前湖沉积物的多代理数据收集方法的应用可以通过提供连续记录来提高冰川变化重建的准确性。然而，这些方法也可能由于非冰川过程（如降雨事件和泥石流）而引入挑战，这可能会混淆清晰冰川信号的提取。因此，需要仔细解释，以区分沉积记录中的冰川和非冰川影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary intention behind developing a dataset that focuses on the offset between calibrated pollen 14C ages and sediment depositional ages?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个关注校准花粉14C年龄与沉积沉积年龄之间偏差的数据集的主要意图是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary intention is to use the offset, defined as the 'old pollen effect' (OPE), as a new indicator of glacier melt intensity and its fluctuations. This approach aims to provide a long-term record of glacier variability over the past 2.5 k.y. and to infer spatial correlations and dynamics of late Holocene glacier changes in monsoonal High Asia.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目的是将定义为“旧花粉效应”（OPE）的偏移量作为冰川融化强度及其波动的新指标。该方法旨在提供过去2500年冰川变化的长期记录，并推断季风高亚洲晚全新世冰川变化的空间相关性和动态。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to implement multiple proxies in the collection of data from proglacial lake sediments to reconstruct glacier changes?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在从冰川前湖沉积物中收集数据以重建冰川变化时，实施多个代理的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Implementing multiple proxies is important because it allows for the reconstruction of continuous records of glacier change, overcoming the limitations of discrete, low-resolution moraine sequences that can be eroded by subsequent glacial advances. This approach helps in extracting glacial signals while accounting for nonglacial processes that may confound the data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 实施多个代理是重要的，因为它允许重建冰川变化的连续记录，从而克服由于后续冰川推进而可能侵蚀的离散、低分辨率的冰碛序列的局限性。这种方法有助于提取冰川信号，同时考虑可能混淆数据的非冰川过程。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What objectives guide the use of a new composite extraction procedure for obtaining pollen and plant residue concentrates in glacier melt research?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在冰川融化研究中，指导使用新复合提取程序以获取花粉和植物残留物浓缩物的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to achieve relatively pure pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates from finely laminated sediments, which can then be used for independent 14C dating. This allows for a more accurate calculation of the age offset between pollen and sediment ages, providing insights into the glacier melt intensity over historical periods and its fluctuations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是从细层沉积物中获得相对纯净的花粉浓缩物和植物残留物浓缩物，这些浓缩物可以用于独立的14C测年。这使得能够更准确地计算花粉和沉积物年龄之间的时间差，从而提供关于历史时期冰川融化强度及其波动的见解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What composite extraction procedure could be used to isolate relatively pure pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates from finely laminated sediment samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以使用什么复合提取程序来从细层沉积样本中分离相对纯净的花粉浓缩物和植物残留物浓缩物？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the field of studying glacier melt intensity over the past 2500 years, a composite extraction procedure was utilized to isolate relatively pure pollen concentrates and plant residue concentrates (PRC; >125 μm) from finely laminated sediments. This involved retrieving sediment cores from the depositional center of a lake and using a new composite extraction method to obtain the required materials for radiocarbon dating.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在研究过去2500年冰川融化强度的领域中，采用了一种复合提取程序，以从细层沉积物中分离出相对纯净的花粉浓缩物和植物残留物浓缩物（PRC；>125 μm）。这涉及从湖泊的沉积中心提取沉积物核心，并使用一种新的复合提取方法获得进行放射性碳定年的所需材料。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological approach could be applied to calculate the 'old pollen effect' as an indicator of glacier melt intensity?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以采用什么方法论来计算“古花粉效应”，作为冰川融化强度的指标？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To calculate the 'old pollen effect' (OPE) as an indicator of glacier melt intensity, one could subtract the interpolated sediment deposition ages from the calibrated pollen ages. This involves using 2σ intervals according to the deposition model to determine the age offset (∆Agepollen) between the pollen and estimated sediment ages, providing insights into past glacier melt fluctuations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了计算“旧花粉效应”（OPE）作为冰川融化强度的指标，可以通过从校准的花粉年龄中减去插值的沉积沉积年龄来实现。这涉及使用2σ区间根据沉积模型确定花粉和估计沉积年龄之间的年龄偏移（∆Agepollen），从而提供对过去冰川融化波动的洞察。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods have enabled the accurate reconstruction of ancient glacier melt intensity using proglacial lake sediments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法使得能够通过前冰川湖泊沉积物准确重建古代冰川融化强度？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of radiocarbon dating on plant residue concentrates and pollen concentrates extracted from lake sediments, along with the calibration of 14C ages using IntCal13, has enabled the accurate reconstruction of ancient glacier melt intensity. The innovative 'old pollen effect' serves as an indicator of glacier melt intensity fluctuations.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 对湖泊沉积物中提取的植物残留物浓缩物和花粉浓缩物进行放射性碳定年，并结合使用IntCal13对14C年龄进行校准，使得古代冰川融化强度的准确重建成为可能。创新的“老花粉效应”作为冰川融化强度波动的指示器。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What factors have contributed to the development of a new indicator for glacier melt intensity based on pollen age discrepancies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些因素促成了基于花粉年龄差异的新冰川融化强度指标的发展？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The development of the 'old pollen effect' as a new indicator is attributed to the realization that intensified glacier melt releases old pollen from glacier ice, leading to larger offsets between calibrated pollen 14C ages and sediment depositional ages. This understanding was facilitated by comparing these offsets with regional moraine ages.
Enablement.AnswerCn: “旧花粉效应”的发展作为一种新指标，归因于认识到加速的冰川融化释放了冰川冰中的旧花粉，从而导致校准的花粉14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间出现更大的偏差。这一理解是通过将这些偏差与区域冰碛年龄进行比较而得出的。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in accurately reconstructing long-term glacier melt intensity over the past millennia using lake sediments?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用湖泊沉积物准确重建过去千年冰川融化强度时，可能会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Nonglacial processes such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows can confound the extraction of glacial signals from proglacial lake sediments, creating challenges in accurately reconstructing long-term glacier melt intensity.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 非冰川过程，如降雨事件、崩积活动和泥石流，可能会干扰从冰川前湖沉积物中提取冰川信号，从而在准确重建长期冰川融化强度方面带来挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected reasons that could lead to the development of a new indicator like the 'old pollen effect' for understanding glacier melt fluctuations?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 导致开发类似“旧花粉效应”的新指标以理解冰川融化波动的预期原因有哪些？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The 'old pollen effect' was developed as a new indicator because it reflects the offset between the calibrated pollen 14C ages and the sediment depositional age, which provides insights into glacier melt intensity and its fluctuations, offering a novel approach to studying glacier dynamics over long timescales.
Expectation.AnswerCn: “旧花粉效应”作为一种新指标被开发出来，因为它反映了校准的花粉14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差，这为冰川融化强度及其波动提供了洞察，提供了一种研究长期冰川动态的新方法。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the use of multiple proxies in sediment analysis be necessary for understanding glacier changes, and what challenges could arise from this approach?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在沉积物分析中使用多个代理可能对于理解冰川变化是必要的，使用这种方法可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Multiple proxies, such as organic matter content, elements, and grain size, are necessary to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change because they can capture different aspects of environmental conditions. However, challenges arise as nonglacial processes can interfere with the clarity of glacial signals extracted from these proxies.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 多个代理，如有机物含量、元素和颗粒大小，对于重建冰川变化的连续记录是必要的，因为它们可以捕捉环境条件的不同方面。然而，由于非冰川过程可能干扰从这些代理中提取的冰川信号的清晰度，因此会出现挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how effective is the use of pollen concentrates as a proxy for reconstructing glacier melt intensity over long periods?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，使用花粉浓缩物作为重建长时间冰川融化强度的代理方法效果如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of pollen concentrates as a proxy for reconstructing glacier melt intensity is considered effective as it provides a continuous record of glacier variability over long periods. The offset between calibrated pollen 14C ages and sediment depositional ages, termed the 'old pollen effect,' serves as a new indicator of glacier melt intensity and fluctuations, revealing insights into glacier dynamics and paleoclimatic changes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用花粉浓缩物作为重建冰川融化强度的代理被认为是有效的，因为它提供了长时间段内冰川变化的连续记录。经过校准的花粉14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差，称为“老花粉效应”，作为冰川融化强度和波动的新指标，揭示了冰川动态和古气候变化的见解。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What challenges do you foresee in employing multi-proxy approaches to differentiate between glacial and nonglacial signals in lake sediment data?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您预见在采用多代理方法区分湖泊沉积物数据中的冰川信号和非冰川信号时会面临哪些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: One of the main challenges in employing multi-proxy approaches is the difficulty in distinguishing between glacial and nonglacial signals due to confounding factors such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows. These nonglacial processes can obscure the extraction of clear glacial signals from lake sediment data, complicating the interpretation of glacier dynamics over time.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 采用多代理方法的主要挑战之一是由于降雨事件、堆积活动和碎屑流等混杂因素，难以区分冰川信号和非冰川信号。这些非冰川过程可能会掩盖湖泊沉积物数据中清晰冰川信号的提取，从而使冰川动态的时间解释变得复杂。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the 'old pollen effect' can serve as an indicator of glacier melt intensity in this area.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白“旧花粉效应”如何能作为该地区冰川融化强度的指标。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The 'old pollen effect' (OPE) is defined as the offset between the calibrated pollen 14C ages and the sediment depositional age. It is interpreted as a new indicator of glacier melt intensity because intensified glacier melt releases more old pollen from the old ice, which, together with overridden soil from beneath the glacier, enters proglacial lakes. This results in a larger offset between the calibrated 14C ages of pollen in lake sediments and the sediment depositional age.
Assertion.AnswerCn: “旧花粉效应”（OPE）被定义为校准的花粉14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差。它被解释为冰川融化强度的新指标，因为加剧的冰川融化会释放更多来自旧冰的旧花粉，这些花粉与冰川下方的覆盖土壤一起进入冰川前湖泊。这导致湖泊沉积物中花粉的校准14C年龄与沉积物沉积年龄之间的偏差增大。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced in using multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定使用来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理来重建冰川变化的连续记录所面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: One of the challenges in using multi-proxies from proglacial lake sediments to reconstruct continuous records of glacier change is that nonglacial processes such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows can confound the extraction of glacial signals. This makes it difficult to isolate and accurately interpret the glacial signals from other environmental and geological factors influencing the sediment record.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 使用来自冰川前湖沉积物的多重代理来重建冰川变化的连续记录面临的挑战之一是，非冰川过程如降雨事件、崩塌活动和碎屑流可能会干扰冰川信号的提取。这使得从其他环境和地质因素影响的沉积记录中孤立和准确解释冰川信号变得困难。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges involved in extracting continuous records of glacier change from proglacial lake sediments and suggest alternative data collection methods to mitigate these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析从冰川前湖沉积物中提取冰川变化连续记录所面临的挑战，并建议替代数据收集方法以减轻这些挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in extracting continuous records from proglacial lake sediments include interference from nonglacial processes such as rainfall events, colluvial activity, and debris flows. These processes can confound the extraction of glacial signals. Alternative data collection methods could involve using multi-proxies like organic matter content, elements, and grain size analysis, along with advanced radiocarbon dating techniques to isolate glacial signals more effectively.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 从冰川前湖沉积物中提取连续记录的挑战包括来自非冰川过程的干扰，例如降雨事件、崩塌活动和碎屑流。这些过程可能会混淆冰川信号的提取。替代的数据收集方法可以涉及使用多重代理，如有机物含量、元素和粒度分析，以及先进的放射性碳定年技术，以更有效地孤立冰川信号。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please propose a research approach to enhance the understanding of glacier dynamics using the 'old pollen effect' as an indicator of glacier melt intensity.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提出一种研究方法，以利用“古花粉效应”作为冰川融化强度的指标，增强对冰川动态的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: A research approach to enhance understanding of glacier dynamics using the 'old pollen effect' could involve collecting and analyzing sediments from multiple proglacial lakes to compare the old pollen effect across different regions. This would allow for the examination of spatial correlations between glacier melt intensity and climatic factors such as temperature variations and mid-latitude Westerlies. Implementing high-resolution chronological frameworks and integrating data with other paleoclimatic indicators could provide deeper insights into glacier dynamics.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一种增强对冰川动态理解的研究方法是利用“古花粉效应”，通过收集和分析来自多个冰川前湖的沉积物，以比较不同地区的古花粉效应。这将允许研究冰川融化强度与气候因素（如温度变化和中纬度西风带）之间的空间相关性。实施高分辨率的年代框架，并将数据与其他古气候指标整合，可以提供对冰川动态的更深入见解。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential datasets that could be used to validate the reconstructed glacier variability over the past 2500 years and discuss methods for integrating these datasets into existing models.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探索可以用于验证过去2500年冰川变化重建的潜在数据集，并讨论将这些数据集整合到现有模型中的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets for validating reconstructed glacier variability could include regional moraine ages, ice core data, and historical temperature records. Methods for integrating these datasets into existing models might involve using statistical techniques to correlate the old pollen effect with moraine sequences and regional climate proxies. This integration can be facilitated by constructing comprehensive age-depth models and employing algorithms like P_Sequence in Oxcal for chronological alignment.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 验证重建冰川变异性的潜在数据集可以包括区域冰碛年龄、冰芯数据和历史温度记录。将这些数据集整合到现有模型中的方法可能涉及使用统计技术将古花粉效应与冰碛序列和区域气候代理进行相关分析。这种整合可以通过构建综合的年龄-深度模型和使用像Oxcal中的P_Sequence算法进行时间对齐来实现。
